function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing measures in virtual programs for SMEs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among participants","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing guidelines and limit the number of participants per session","Technologies":"Virtual event management platforms with built-in participant limits and communication features","People":"Participants in virtual programs","Owner":"Incubation hubs, innovation centers"},{"Description":"Lack of financial support for entrepreneurship programs","Impact":"Limited resources for entrepreneurs, hindering innovation and growth","Mitigation":"Government funding and grants for entrepreneurship support programs","Technologies":"Government budget allocation and grant management systems","People":"Entrepreneurs, incubation hubs, innovation centers","Owner":"Government, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate government interventions for revitalizing the entrepreneurial ecosystem","Impact":"Undermined growth and recovery of SMEs, hindering innovation and sustainable development","Mitigation":"Increased government support through policy frameworks, financial incentives, and capacity building initiatives","Technologies":"Policy development and monitoring tools, financial tracking and reporting systems","People":"Entrepreneurs, government officials","Owner":"Government"}]}
